lines.text: You turn the page, wash your hands.
Rocko, what're you doing?

[With a paddle in his hand]
We're playing spank the monkey.
I'm not a dog, I'm a wallaby!
A wallaby?
Yeah. It's like a kangaroo, only smaller.
You made that up!
Arr, and then, I heard a scream so loud it could be heard down in Davy Jones' locker. Mickey Dolenz's locker too, and Peter Tork's locker. All the Monkees had lockers...
I'm nauseous! I'm nauseous! I'm nauseous!
[Ed Bighead walks into his home. Rocko has no shirt on. Bev is handing him a bit of cash. She sees him, and plants a *large* smooch on him. Rocko steps back]
Uh, er... Mr. Bighead! It's not what you think! I was just
[points]
... um, and she...
[Rocko begins falling apart, like a Jenga game]

[angry]
You saw my wife in her bath robe?
[disturbed]
Isn't it awful?

[Reading the Fortune Cookie]
Bad luck and extreme misfortune will infest your pathetic soul for all eternity.
Excuse me, sir. But garbage and dogs are not part of a balanced diet.
If this marriage is going to break up our friendship, I'd rather be deported!
Why do we wear these things on our shoulders?
Because... it's the future! Thank you for stopping by.
A wallaby in a boat waving a fish... That's odd - yet strangely appetizing!
Garbage day is a very dangerous day.
[repeated line]
I thought I told you to keep your bird away from MY MONKEY!

[opening the door and finding out it's Rocko's deportation officer]
WHAT IN THE HELLL... LO?
[messes up; growls]
How dare you!
Look behind you! A wild pig!
I'm a wild pig!
You know, I died once.
Really?
Ahhh, this is no problem. She's at the Eiffel Tower!
Really?
Sure! All cheesy love stories end there!
I say we eat the beaver!
You turn the page, wash your hands. Turn the page, wash your hands. Turn the page, wash your hands...
[to Spunky]
Hey you! Get out of my salmon bushes!
[repeated line]
Oooo-ooo; that was a hoot!
[Ed is spying on Rocko's backyard, where a nudist party is being held]
Bev! Oh, I can't believe it! Do you know what that *weirdo* next door is up to?
Oh, shut up and mind your own business, Ed.
But, Bev! They're, well... *Nude*!
[Excited, Bev grabs the binoculars from Ed]
Oh, Ed! Oh, you're right! Yes! This is disgusting!
[in whisper]
Quick, Ed, get the telescope out of the hall closet!
You monsters are all alike. You march in here like you own the place and start redecorating.
Look into my nipples of the future.

[singing]
Oh, I don't have the patience to recycle. I don't care about the o-zone layer. I don't buy a single thing that's biodegradeable and I just dump my garbage anywhere.
[gets fried by sudden blast of sunlight]
So you see, kids... If we're not nice to Mother Nature... she'll kick your butts.
[Rocko, Heffer and Filburt are about to be hit with bowling balls by the Schitzel Cult]
You can't chuck bowling balls at us!
Yes, we can. Says so in the Great Book of Bratwurst.
[reads]
"And if there is one among you who does not follow the ways of the Schnitzel, let that one go, and do not throw bowling balls at them."
You see? It says let us go.
It's a matter of interpretation.
Hef, where did you get a motorcycle?
I saved my snack money for a whole week.
I'm starving. What's the biggest thing on the menu?

That would be our Knockwurst Nightmare Platter, 570 pounds of ground pig parts packed tightly but tantalizingly into over two miles of intestinal tubing. No-one has ever finished the Nightmare Platter.
I'll take two.
There aren't enough pigs in the country, sir.
I am the Dark Underlord, the Prince of Doom, the King of Eternal Torment! I am Pain! I am Evil! They call me... Peaches!
Can you pass the remote?
You poor fool. Still don't realize where you are? There is no remote!
Aaaaugh!
Look out everyone! He's visually impaired!
Hey Rock! Do that goofy face you do when you're buying eggs!

[trying to turn the Suck-o-Matic off]
I must cease this senseless sucking!
[keeps pulling and pushing the switch and nothing happens]
It's stuck in suck!
I am the cheese. I am the best character on this show. I am better than the salami and the bologna combined.
Heff, everybody's bonkers for me bum!
I know. You've got the most famous fanny in O-Town!
Through the use of sophisticated computer technology, and a box of crayons, we have constructed a likeness of Dingo today.

[voiceover]
Don't touch the green button!

I turned leeward in time to witness the full sail yardarm give way and came crashing down on my midshipman's hind quarters. He let out a scream that could be heard all the way down in Davy Jones' locker. Micky Dolenz's locker too, and Peter Tork's locker. All the Monkees had lockers.
What the heck is Rocko? Is he some kind of dog?
I think he's a rabbit.
A rabbit.
You're asking *me*?
Everyone seems to have an opinion. Excuse me... may I ask you something?

[in disguise]
Umm... Me llamo Francior!

[in disguise]
And I don't speak English!
Stick your face in our stuff.

[singing]
Oh, I don't have the patience to recycle! I don't care about the o-zone layer! I don't buy a single thing that's biodegradeable and I just dump my garbage anywhere!
Don't worry, Heff, we can still have a nice Thanksgiving. I bought us a nice big vegetarian turkey. It'll be delicious!
No, it's not the same.
If you were a true friend, you'd burn my butt. C'mon, brand me, brand me, brand me.
This is a 1954 McSpirit Spectervision 3000, and it belongs to me! Do you know what that makes it?
Um... I give up.
It's the TV from Heck!
[Heffer and Peaches laugh]
Wait a minute. Heck? Isn't it supposed to be...

[Covers Heffer's mouth]
Censors! And here's the lamp from Heck, and the pineapple from Heck...
I love it when people say that.
Hey, Rocko. Which is funnier, bananas or cheese?
Cheese, Hef. Definitely cheese.
[At the funeral for Filburt's bird, Turdy]
Heffer, would you like to say a few words?
Uh... Beans, beans, they're good for your heart, the more you eat...
All right, that's enough of that.
I don't OWN any spandex!
Grocery day is a very dangerous day, but at least we got food.
Um... yes... uh... Turdy was a, um, bird.
Oh, that's so beautiful!

[after finding Rocko in the dumpster, his nail-biting problem out of control]
All this toe-chewing is making me hungry. Let's go get some chili!
I'm calling the phone!
I'm wearing European Style Undergarments!
I've always liked... rainbows
Rocko!

Wacky Delly is degrading garbage. Its confused social morals and disturbing undertones are tormenting the youths of our nation. Kids everywhere are mindlessly imitating Wacky Delly antics. In Garberville, California. In Ogallala, Nebraska. For God's sake, WE'VE GOT TO STOP THE CARNAGE.

[after he gets a watch that glows in the dark]
Ask me what time it is.
Oh my! A house made of healthy snacks!
Healthy Snacks? No way! The house is made of pizza!
Healthy snacks!
Pizza!
Healthy Snacks!
Pizza!
Healthy snacks!
Pizza!
No! You're both wrong! The house is made of fishsticks!

[Rocko is screwing in a light bulb]
Rocko, could I interrupt you for a moment? There is a spider in the bathroom. Would you mind shooing him out for me?
Don't worry, Mrs. Bighead. I'll get rid of him.
[Rocko opens the bathroom door. A rather large spider struggles on the toliet, holding a newspaper. The spider sees Rocko]

[Yiddish accent]
Hey! Vad is dis, a sideshow?
Let me tell you something... This machine... is worth more than you!
It is not for beginners!
Give me another order!
